page.title: 11DAY OF BOY IN N.BRISTOL
page.content: I rose at 9.00 pm on Saturday.I put my blue pants,white socks,breakdance tee- shirt,jeans,olympus top & boots with very thick red laces on.I went down stairs & had a bowl of Frosties & some toast for breakfast.I went outside to fetch my bike from the garage & called for Alexander.We got his lilo out & my portable stereo & my electro 6 tape & went round the flats to watch Alex breakdance until 10.15am.Then we took all the stuff back to my house & got the cricket set out & had a game of cricket in the street. It got a bit boring so we got our bikes out & went down the park & rode about & pulled wheelies.I went back to my house to have dinner.I had pizza & chips.I called for Simon & we went over the golf course looking for golf balls.For tea I had crisps & ham sandwiches.I watched T.V.for the rest of the day.
